plugins.name: skinnerplugin
plugins.description:
Bring your CSS themes to life effortlessly with Skinner. This plugin empowers designers to create, manage, and apply consistent styles across all elements of their Figma projects with ease. By simply providing a CSS theme, Skinner instantly generates paint styles for backgrounds, text, and accents, enabling a streamlined and cohesive design workflow.


With Skinner, you can:


Generate and update styles in seconds.

Maintain a consistent design aesthetic across your projects.

Easily switch between different color themes and accents for versatile design needs.

Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or any digital interface, Skinner ensures that your styles are always organized, professional, and ready for use.


Simplify. Style. Create. With Skinner.
plugins.tagline: Skinner - Seamless Style Generation for Figma

plugins.name: Pancake Work
plugins.description:
Guideline (Vietnamese):

  1. Plugin giúp link figma design vào một issue của Pancake Work
  2. Các bước thực hiện:


  1. Vào Pancake Work copy link issue
  2. Chọn node cần gắn link, chú ý đánh dấu ready for dev cho node đó trước (nếu cần) (node nên là frame/section)
  3. Mở plugin Pancake Work, paste link issue vào ô đầu tiên (Plugin có lưu lại link với mỗi node)
  4. Click vào ô thứ 2, nhấn Cmd + L (với Mac), hoặc Ctrl + L (với Windows) để lấy link figma, rồi paste
  5. Nhấn Create/Update


Roadmap:

  1. Update English guideline
  2. Listen feedback from Pancake designers to improve
  3. Maybe link for Kanban
  4. Hmmm, I don't know...


Copyright 2024 Pancake

plugins.name: ex-portable
plugins.description:
Ex-portable is a super simple plug-in for Figma that allows you to pull export settings from a main component in a library to an instance. That’s all.


Get settings for selected instances

Select the instances you want to apply the export settings from a main component in a library for, and select this command.


Get settings for all instances

Got a lot of instances on your page? Select this command to apply export settings from their main components.

plugins.name: Easily Name output
plugins.description:
Step 1: Export Name Mapping


Prefix the node name with "▼". For example: "▼page-template".

Enter the Google Sheet URL in the first input field or click the file button to select a file.

The number of nodes must match the number of rows in the uploaded document (excluding the title).

The name mapping should be in the first column, with the column header named "Name".

Specify the corresponding sheet name.

If an XLSX file is selected, the first sheet will be prefilled.

Step 2: Export


Select the nodes to be exported.

If none are selected, all nodes on the current page starting with "▼" will be exported.

Choose the export format (PDF/PNG/JPG/SVG).
plugins.tagline: Replace Export Names for Figma Frame Types

plugins.name: CSV to Table
plugins.description:
Convierte fácilmente archivos CSV en tablas dentro de Figma.


Con el plugin CSV to Table, importar datos a tus diseños nunca fue tan fácil. Simplemente selecciona tu archivo .csv y el plugin generará una tabla visual editable directamente en tu lienzo de Figma. Ideal para diseñadores de productos, equipos de UX/UI y presentaciones con datos reales.


🔹 Importa datos reales sin salir de Figma

🔹 Transforma automáticamente filas y columnas en capas de texto y formas

🔹 Personaliza estilos una vez importado

🔹 Sin necesidad de conexión a internet – tus datos permanecen seguros


Este recurso es completamente gratuito y no almacena tu información. Solo tú tienes acceso a los datos que importas.


---


Easily turn CSV files into tables inside Figma.


With the CSV to Table plugin, importing structured data into your designs is effortless. Just upload your .csv file, and this plugin will generate an editable table directly on your Figma canvas. Perfect for product designers, UX/UI teams, or anyone working with real data.


🔹 Import real data without leaving Figma

🔹 Automatically transforms rows and columns into styled text and shapes

🔹 Customize your table’s style after import

🔹 No internet connection needed – your data stays safe


This is a completely free community resource. Your data is never uploaded or stored externally.
plugins.tagline: Convierte CSV en tablas editables / Convert CSV files into editable Figma tables instantly.

plugins.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
plugins.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
plugins.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Syntax Manager
plugins.description:
Syntax Manager helps you efficiently organize and apply code syntax (Web, Android, iOS) to your Figma variables. Whether you're prepping for development or just keeping things tidy, it streamlines your syntax workflow.


Core Features

  1. Filter variables by syntax status: all, with syntax, or without
  2. Narrow results by variable library or specific folder
  3. Search by variable name or syntax label
  4. Clean table view displaying variable names and their assigned syntax (Web, Android, iOS)
  5. Inline syntax editing: click directly on the syntax to edit it on the spot
  6. Multiselect with quick Select/Deselect All
  7. Floating action bar to apply updates or remove syntax for selected or all variables
  8. Custom syntax input field with {value} dynamic placeholder support
  9. Prefix dropdown (Auto / Name / Syntax) to control how the template is applied
  10. Advanced find/replace patterns using > and multiple replacements separated by ; for flexible syntax modification


Key Benefits

  1. Saves time: Batch-edit syntax across multiple variables in seconds
  2. Reduces errors: See all syntax at a glance and avoid inconsistencies
  3. Flexible control: Customize syntax naming conventions with smart placeholders
  4. Streamlines handoff: Align design tokens with dev-ready syntax for every platform
  5. Scales effortlessly: Perfect for small projects or massive variable libraries


How to Use

  1. Choose your view: filter by syntax presence or focus on specific libraries/folders
  2. Search or scroll to find relevant variables
  3. Select variables manually or use Select All
  4. Click directly on any syntax cell to edit it inline, or use the footer bar to add, update, or remove syntax
  5. Enter a custom syntax name (or leave it blank to use the variable name) or use find>replace patterns or ; for multiple replacements to transform parts of variable names (for instructions click the (?) icon)
  6. Apply your changes – done!
plugins.tagline: Syntax management for variables made effortless.

plugins.name: Spacing and radius fixer
plugins.description:
Auto-fix spacing & radius

Plugin that automatically rounds spacing and radius values to the nearest preset value in Auto Layout objects.


What it does

- Rounds gap and padding values to the nearest preset spacing

- Rounds corner radius to the nearest preset radius

- Works with any Auto Layout object (frames, components, instances)


Presets

Default values (can be customized in plugin):

Spacing: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80 (px)

Radius: 0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 20, 100 (px)


How to use

1. Select Auto Layout object(s)

2. Run the plugin

3. Switch between Spacing/Radius modes

4. Customize presets if needed (or use Reset to restore defaults)

5. Click Apply
plugins.tagline: Fixes inconsistent spacing and radius values by rounding them to the nearest preset

plugins.name: Hive
plugins.description:
Tired of endless swiping, cluttered frames, and struggling to stay focused?

Say hello to Hive, the ultimate Figma plugin designed to transform your design process. With its minimalist approach and powerful features, Hive ensures a smoother, more organized, and efficient workflow for designers and teams alike. Perfect for those working on complex projects with multiple screens and teams presenting designs or collaborating on organized workspaces.


Key Features

🗂 Create Categories: Group frames into organized categories for a streamlined workflow.

🔍 Zoom-In Functionality: Quickly focus on specific categories, making navigation seamless.

🎯 Smooth Screen Presentation: Eliminate the frustration of moving around messy frames while presenting. Hive ensures a clean, irritation-free presentation experience.

⚡ Simplified Workflow: Minimalist, easy-to-use interface that saves time and effort.

🔄 Quick Frame Switching: Easily switch between frames without excessive swiping, allowing for a faster and more efficient workflow as you move through different tasks.


Why This Plugin?

When working on large design files, scrolling endlessly, searching for frames, or jumping between screens during team presentations can be chaotic and jarring to the eye. Hive eliminates the frustration by organizing frames into clear categories and enabling zoom-in functionality. Whether you're working alone or presenting designs to your team, Hive keeps your workspace smooth, clean, and irritation-free.

🚀 Boost Productivity: Spend less time navigating and more time designing.

🗂️ Stay Organized: Keep your navigation intuitive without modifying your file structure.

🎯 Improve Focus: Streamline your workflow to maintain momentum on your creative projects.

🤝 Enhance Collaboration: Share organized and easy-to-navigate files with your team, fostering better teamwork and understanding.

⏳ Save Time: Glide’s intuitive features reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, giving you more room for creativity.


Ready to Hive? Try it out now and watch your productivity soar. Let your designs flow effortlessly. Organize, focus, and present without distractions.
plugins.tagline: Hive: Organise. Categorise. Focus.

plugins.name: Zero Me
plugins.description:
Zero Me: Center Your Starting Point


Start designing from anywhere on the canvas, and when you're ready, let Zero Me center your creations. Simply select your frames and objects, run the plugin, and Zero Me will position your designs at coordinates (0, 0), keeping your canvas clean and organized.


Zero Me is a small but mighty Figma plugin that simplifies the process of centering and aligning your designs. It's for designers who want to maintain a tidy workspace and ensure a consistent starting point for their projects.


Key Features:

1. Center Alignment: Zero Me sets the position of your selected frames and objects to coordinates (0, 0), providing a centered starting point for your designs.

2. Multiple Object Support: Select multiple frames and objects, and Zero Me will align them all to the center of the canvas.


Install Zero Me and experience the convenience of a centered starting point for your Figma designs.


Created by Taryn + Claude 3 Opus
plugins.tagline: Center you Frames, Objects, Sections, and Self 🧘

plugins.name: Liquid Glass UI
plugins.description:
Liquid Glass UI – Apple-Inspired Glass Effects for Figma


Bring the elegance of Apple’s design language into your UI projects — effortlessly.


Liquid Glass UI is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you apply beautifully crafted glassmorphism styles to any object with just one click. Whether you’re designing an app interface, a website mockup, or a sleek landing page, this plugin gives your elements that polished, high-end glass feel — instantly.



Key Features:


  1. Apple Liquid Glass Effect: Recreate the iconic frosted-glass look seen in iOS 26 and macOS 26 — with precise lighting and softness.


  1. Multiple Glass Styles: Choose from a range of pre-designed styles including Tinted Glass, Clear Glass, Vibrant Glass, and more.


  1. Customizable Properties: Adjust light direction, brightness, blur intensity, and corner radius to match your unique design.


  1. Text & Image Settings: Seamlessly blend or highlight text and images inside or above the glass layer for perfect readability and harmony.


  1. One-Click Application: No more manual layering or tweaking! select your object, click, and you’re done.



Whether you’re aiming for a sleek Apple-style UI, or just want to elevate your design with modern glass effects, Liquid Glass UI is here to make it effortless.


👉 Try it now and give your designs that smooth, sleek, and premium finish — the Apple way.
plugins.tagline: Smooth. Sleek. Apple-Inspired Glass Styles — All With a Single Click

plugins.name: Scout : Your Design System Auditor
plugins.description:
Scout: Your Design System Auditor

Ever felt like your design tokens are playing hide-and-seek? 🕵️‍♀️ Meet Scout, your trusty design detective—ready to sniff out sneaky inconsistencies and bring harmony back to your Figma universe!


Scout swiftly audits your Figma files, uncovering rogue color hexes and typography rebels that forgot their tokens at home. No more developer handoff blues or "Oops, missed that!" moments. 🎯


Superpowers:

Color Detective: Catches color chaos quicker than you can shout “Hex!”


Typography Sleuth: Spots font fugitives and sizes that went astray, keeping your design tight.


Smart Suggestions: Suggests spot-on tokens and handy fallbacks instantly—because who doesn't love instant magic? ✨


Theme-Agnostic: Works seamlessly with both light and dark themes, maintaining style consistency across all modes.


Local Variable & Style Support: Perfectly compatible with local variables and styles, ensuring complete design system integration.


Pinpoint Precision: Clearly tells you exactly where the issue is—no guessing games, just solutions!


How to Use Scout:


1. Feed Your Tokens: Connect Scout to your design system first—it'll securely save all your tokens locally.

2. Scan: Open Scout in any Figma file, select the frame you want to check, and hit "Scan."

3. Instant Results: Scout immediately highlights issues, suggests precise fixes, and ensures your designs stay token-perfect.


Scout is fun, quirky, and deadly accurate; a designer's best friend and a developer's dream come true. Let Scout do the heavy lifting and keep your designs perfectly polished. 


Get Scout today and give your design system the auditor it deserves.


Scout is currently in beta. Found bugs? Have questions, suggestions, or feature requests? 💌 DM me on Twitter

accepted.name: Satyam
accepted.description: Product and UI/UX Designer | Email me at sat02yam@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Keep Scouting

plugins.name: Yet Another Design Linter
plugins.description:
✨ Yet Another Design Linter (YADL): Your Design System's Enforcer

YADL is the essential Figma plugin for teams who care about consistency, scalability, and design system integrity. Automate linting, enforce variable use, and ship cleaner designs—fast.


🚀 Why use it?

Design systems aren't just style guides—they're contracts. YADL automates enforcing those contracts so you're not stuck playing pixel cop.


🔍 What it does:

• Variable-Aware Linting + Auto-Fix: Instantly checks padding, gap, radius, stroke width, fills, strokes, effects, and typography—flags rogue values and suggests or auto-applies matching design tokens.


• Smart Error Grouping: See issues grouped by type and value with intelligent prioritization; focus on what matters most.


• Typography Linting: Comprehensive checks for font family, size, weight, line height, and letter spacing consistency.


• Deleted Variable Detection: Identifies broken variable references and optionally auto-detaches them to prevent errors.


• Component Structure Analysis: Detects nested components that may cause performance issues.


• Accessibility Checks: Flags common a11y pitfalls for inclusive design.


• Flexible Layer Filtering: Configurable options to include/exclude hidden or locked layers.


• Strict Linting Mode: Enhanced validation rules for production-ready designs.


• Variable Collection Control: Choose which variable collections to include in suggestions.


• Persistent UI State: Remembers window size and settings for smoother workflow.


• Precise Value Suggestions: See exact px values next to each suggestion—no guessing.


• Resizable, Accessible UI: Resize handle + full keyboard navigation for better UX.


🚦 It detects:

✅ Generic layer names (e.g., "Frame 1", "Rectangle 2")

✅ Absolute positioning inside auto layout

✅ All padding types (left, right, top, bottom, horizontal, vertical) not using variables

✅ Gap, border radius, stroke width not using variables

✅ Fill colors, stroke colors, effects not using variables

✅ Typography properties (font family, size, weight, line height, letter spacing) not using variables

✅ Broken variable references from deleted design tokens

✅ Nested components causing potential performance issues

✅ Issues in hidden or locked layers (configurable)


🎨 How it works:

1. Run the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Review errors categorized by type (Core Design, Spacing & Layout, Visual Properties, Typography, Variable Management, Component Structure).

3. Apply auto-suggestions with one click or fix issues manually.

4. Configure settings to match your team's workflow and design system.


💡 Who it's for:

• Designers who care about clean, token-driven files

• Teams enforcing scalable, maintainable design systems

• Design system managers ensuring consistency across projects

• Developers who need structured, handoff-ready designs

• Teams transitioning to variable-based design workflows


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system audits and cleanup

• Onboarding new team members to design standards

• Pre-handoff quality checks

• Maintaining design token consistency at scale


Made with ❤️ for the Adtraction design team by Jonatan D. Bjerrekær.


YADL: Keep your Figma files clean, scalable, and system-perfect—automatically.
plugins.tagline: Keep your Figma files clean, consistent, and design-system perfect—automatically.

140328.release_notes:
Enhance font loading and management features for improved performance and user experience

- Update manifest to allow access to Google Fonts, enabling dynamic font loading.
- Implement font loading utilities in variableUtils for better font detection and fallback handling.
- Enhance TypographyPreview component to check font availability and display loading states, providing users with clear feedback on font status.
- Introduce new CSS styles for font loading indicators and Google Font badges, improving visual clarity and responsiveness.
- Optimize font rendering and loading strategies to ensure a seamless experience in Figma plugin environment.
140328.tagline: Keep your Figma files clean, consistent, and design-system perfect—automatically.

plugins.name: Lexi: Localize & Translate your design
plugins.description:
Design once—translate instantly. Lexi automates text translation in your Figma frames while keeping your layout intact. Perfect for multilingual apps, marketing assets, and App/Play Store screenshots.


🚀 Why Lexi?

50+ languages – Translate your designs into multiple languages in seconds.

Batch translation – Select multiple frames & languages at once.

Seamless workflow – Translated frames stay organized with clear naming.



🔧 How It Works

Select your frames – Pick the designs you need to translate.

Choose your languages – Supports all major languages, including English, Spanish, Japanese, Arabic, and more.

Translate with AI – Lexi uses OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 Turbo for high-quality, natural translations.

Get organized output – New frames are created, named with language codes, and maintain the original design structure.


🔒 Best Practices

Font compatibility – If a language isn't displaying correctly, try swapping fonts to Roboto or Inter for best results.


Who is Lexi for?

🌎 Designers working on global products.

📱 Teams creating multi-language UI/UX designs.

📢 Marketers adapting assets for international campaigns.

🏢 Agencies handling multilingual clients.


Credits:

Some of the designs featured in this plugin are from @ramsriperambudr. Thanks for the amazing work! 🙌


Ready to make your designs multilingual? Start localizing with Lexi today! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Translate all text in selected frames—perfect for multilingual apps & App/Play Store assets.

plugins.name: Component Boss (Beta)
plugins.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Your Design Workflow

plugins.name: Move Objects Frame
plugins.description:
Move Objects to Frame - オブジェクトをフレームに移動 -


このプラグインを使えば、選択したオブジェクトを指定したフレーム内に素早く移動 できます。

また、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出 して、整理しやすくします。


主な機能：

✅ 選択したオブジェクトを 元の位置を維持したまま フレーム内に移動

✅ フレーム外にあるオブジェクトを検出し、通知でリストアップ

✅ 英語と日本語の両方に対応

✅ シンプルで直感的なUI


📌 使い方：

1️⃣ 1つのフレーム と フレーム内に入れたいオブジェクト を選択します。

2️⃣ 「移動する」ボタンをクリック すると、オブジェクトが位置を変えずにフレーム内へ移動します。

3️⃣ 「フレーム外を確認 🔍」をクリック すると、フレームに入っていないオブジェクトを検出し、リストで表示 します。


Move Objects to Frame を使って、作業効率をアップし、デザインを整理整頓しましょう！🎯

-----------------------------------------------

This plugin allows you to quickly move selected objects into a chosen frame while keeping their original positions.

It also detects objects that are outside any frames and helps you organize your Figma workspace more efficiently.


Features:

✅ Move multiple objects into a selected frame while preserving their positions

✅ Check if objects are outside any frames and get notified

✅ Supports both English and Japanese

✅ Simple and intuitive UI


📌 How to use:

1️⃣ Select one frame and one or more objects that you want to place inside.

2️⃣ Click the “Move it!” button, and the objects will be placed inside the frame without changing their positions.

3️⃣ To check for objects that are not inside any frames, click “Check Unframed 🔍” and get a list of unframed objects.


Boost your workflow efficiency and keep your designs well-organized with Move Objects to Frame! 🎯
plugins.tagline: Move objects into a frame while keeping their positions. Detect and list objects outside any frames.

It also detects objects that are outside any frames and helps you organize your Figma workspace more efficiently.


Features:

✅ Move multiple objects into a selected frame while preserving their positions

✅ Check if objects are outside any frames and get notified

✅ Supports both English and Japanese

✅ Simple and intuitive UI


📌 How to use:

1️⃣ Select one frame and one or more objects that you want to place inside.

2️⃣ Click the “Move it!” button, and the objects will be placed inside the frame without changing their positions.

3️⃣ To check for objects that are not inside any frames, click “Check Unframed 🔍” and get a list of unframed objects.


Boost your workflow efficiency and keep your designs well-organized with Move Objects to Frame! 🎯
120832.tagline: Move objects into a frame while keeping their positions. Detect and list objects outside any frames.

plugins.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

plugins.name: Node Exporter
plugins.description:
🧩 Node Exporter


Node Exporter is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you extract full or partial JSON data from selected design nodes — including all their children — with just a click.


✨ Features


- 🔍 Inspect any selected nodes in your Figma file

- 🧾 Export all node properties (deep scan via prototype chain)

- ✅ Or choose specific common properties to extract (e.g., name, width, layoutMode)

- 🌳 Recursively includes children of selected nodes

- 💾 Outputs clean, downloadable `.json` files

- ⚡️ Fast, no setup, no code required


---


🚀 How to Use


1. Install the plugin from Figma Community

2. Open your Figma or FigJam file

3. Select one or more nodes

4. Right-click → Plugins → Node Exporter

5. You'll see two options:

- `✨ Export All Properties`: grabs every readable property for all selected nodes and children

- `🔧 Choose Properties to Export`: shows a checkbox list of common properties you can include

6. Click the relevant button and a `.json` file will automatically download!


---


📦 Example Use Cases


- Design-to-code workflows

- Creating component libraries

- Auditing design system properties

- JSON handoff for frontend developers

- Custom design analysis


---


🔐 Permissions


Node Exporter does not require any network access or authentication. All processing is done locally in your editor.


---


🧠 Tech Notes


- Uses JavaScript reflection to walk the prototype chain

- Safe error handling (non-serializable properties skipped)

- Deep export support for nested `children` arrays


---


👨‍💻 Developer Info


Created by Agent Null

Have ideas, feedback or bugs? Open an issue or contribute!
plugins.tagline: Extract all or selected node properties as JSON, including children — quick, clean, and magical!

plugins.name: Heurator
plugins.description:
Elevate your design critique process with Heurator, a powerful Figma plugin that brings Nielsen's 10 Usability Heuristics directly into your workflow.


Document, visualize, and solve usability issues with precision—all without leaving your design files.


✓ Pinpoint violations with customizable severity ratings

✓ Generate visually striking evaluation cards linked to problem areas

✓ Create actionable recommendations to improve user experience

✓ Maintain consistent evaluation criteria across your team


Even in the age of AI-generated interfaces, human-centered heuristic evaluation remains essential. While AI excels at creating visually appealing designs, it often misses nuanced usability concerns that experienced designers catch. Heurator bridges this gap by helping you apply proven principles to any interface—whether human or AI-designed—ensuring truly intuitive experiences.


Transform complex usability principles into practical insights and deliver more thoughtful, user-centered designs with Heurator.
plugins.tagline: Because Even AI-Generated UIs Need Human-Centered Evaluation

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi’s Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma’s capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio’s features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


🔧 What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


🚀 Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


📚 Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


🧩 Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


🔒 Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign – Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns
